The thermodilution catheter connect PiCCO2 monitor ( Software version 1.3.0.8 ) . DOC.criteria: Patients > 18 year age leave ventricular ejection fraction ≥ 0.5 . Patients undergo coronary artery bypass grafting . Patients < 18 year age leave ventricular ejection fraction ≤0.5 consider study . Emergency procedures patient hemodynamic instability require continuous pharmacologic support , intracardiac shunt , severe aortic , tricuspid mitral stenosis insufficiency mechanical circulatory support also exclude .
